info.author: Sergey Kudrin
info.description:
Composite Config Reader
=======================

Usage example
-------------

Define path to your config:
::

  export PROJECT_CONF="/home/user/path/to/writable.file"

Than in your code:

.. code-block:: python

  import os
  from creader import Config, item

  PROJECT_CONF = 'PROJECT_CONF'

  filename = os.environ[PROJECT_CONF]
  config = Config(filename)

  if os.path.exists(filename):
      config.load()
  else:
      config.extend((
          item('main').extend((
              item('url', 'http://python.org'),
              item('name', u'Python'),
              item('minutes', False),
          )),
          item('plugins').extend((
              item('weather').extend((
                  item('location', 'Novosibirsk'),
                  item('metric', 'ISO'),
                  item('float', 0.78),
                  item('refresh').extend((
                      item('hours', 0),
                      item('minutes', 15),
                      item('seconds', [0, 15, 30, 45]),
                  ))
              )),
              item('post'),
              item('money')
          )),
          item('addons', ['First', 'Second', 'Third'])
      ))
      config.save()

  print config.output
  print
  print config.get('minutes')
  print
  print config.plugins
  print config.plugins.weather
  print config.plugins.weather.refresh
  print config.plugins.weather.refresh.seconds
